channel.title: PK Shop items cost PK points?
channel.description:
Hey can someone please help me? I use an Allstar source (317). I have a PK Shop and I was wondering how I can make my items in the pk shop cost PK Points instead of Coins.
Skype: modcodygodex I DO HAVE TEAMVIEWER IF THAT HELPS

item.title: PK Shop items cost PK points?
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

That’s delta…Create a token, save the token to the player. Add method to obtain token. Add in shop method to remove tokens on purchase. Profit?

Read full topic

item.title: PK Shop items cost PK points?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

I am pretty sure Allstar’s dont have a shop a shopassistant class… It is one with everything in the client file :x

if (Wanneshop == PKSHOPID)
use (pkpoints, rather than 995(coins)

Read full topic
